sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.description: This tool analyzes the full_defect_context field of defect records for occurrences of keywords per group. Counts how many keywords from each group appears and identifies the group with the highest number of keyword matches. Sets keyword_bucket to that group.
sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.inputs: [{"name":"full_context","value":"","description":"The full_defect_context field of a record in the x_snc_defect_bucke_gaic_defects table","mandatory":false,"invalidMessage":null}]
sn_aia_agent_tool_m2m.name: Defect Keyword Tool
